# Filter Steam Games


A Chrome extension that filters your Steam game search results lists, for example it hides games having less than 1000 reviews.


You dont like being a beta tester? Are you tired of looking for games on Steam just so you have to scroll by hundreds of obscure games with 20 or zero reviews? This extension mouse-hovers over every game in the search result list, so the web page downloads meta-data for every game, then it looks for the review count and compares it to your setting. When a game is too obscure for you, it hides it.

Permissions required:
- Read and change you data on store.steampowered.com

In store at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/deekohgffopledjdofogaakahjccadpp


Open source at https://gitlab.com/phpmoli/filter-games/
